channel.title: Games on Wasd Games
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Wasd Games

item.title: Pet Random Defense(In Progress)
item.description: Pet Random Defense is the second game from Wasd Games that extends the defense game to pets and promises to be a lot of fun.

item.title: Hammer Wars
item.description: Hammer Wars is the first publicly available game from Wasd Games. It is a core game that takes the concept of kill and turns it into blow.
